i.d: There's a reason she's alone 她选择了孤独
You can't pin her down 她不可能驯服
Because no one needs her home 她说，“因为没有人需要我”
Or needs her around, she says “也没有人愿意陪伴我”
"There's beauty in the hills “群山自有其壮美之处”
A chip in the sky “仿若苍穹中一道缺口”
So don't be sad because I roam “不要伤心，我将漫游于天地”
It keeps me alive." “我的生命不息”
To impress her - it's too damn hard 想走进她的心？——太难了
To stay loyal without going too far 誓忠于她，但请止步于此吧
If I see her again promise I won't 若与她再度相会，我将不再
Cry 泪流满面
To impress her - it's too damn hard 想走进她的心？——太难了
To stay loyal without going too far 誓忠于她，但请止步于此吧
If I see her again promise I won't 若与她再度相会，我将不再
Cry 泪流满面
She wasn't back tonight 今夜她终是不归
And I don't know about you 我本并不了解你
My money's on the night，今夜漆黑夜幕，笼罩我的财富
It takes her away like I do 她随财富而去，如同曾经的我
My charm is twinkling out of her eyes 我的魅力已经消散于她的双眸
Of her eyes 她的双眸
She will never grow old 她将会永葆青春
Or change her mind 她已经下定决心
She'll talk about it later on 某日她重新说起
From seeing sights 那些路过的风景
There's something wonderful and odd about the escape 一路逃亡中邂逅的美妙与怪奇
From seeing sights 那些路过的风景
There's something wonderful and odd about the escape 一路逃亡中邂逅的美妙与怪奇
While you want them to be gone 当你想要挥散它们之时
You want them to stay 却又希望它们能够停留
To impress her it's just so damn hard 想走进她的心？——太难了
I want her back, please don't go too far 我呼唤她归来，请不要走远
If I see her again promise I won't 若与她再度相会，我将不再

Cry 泪流满面
She doesn't come back much 时至今日，她不曾归来
No one misses her like I do 没有人像我这般思念她
I hope she's hαving fun 我真心祝愿她旅程愉快
Doing what she wants to 去做些她喜欢做的事儿
And send a postcard or two from the sights 也许寄回一两张明信片
Sometime 偶尔的话……
To impress her is just too damn hard 想走进她的心？——太难了
And I want her back but she's gone too far 我呼唤她的归来，但她已走得太远
